Language Player is an innovative languag: I-Language Player iyipulatifomu yokufunda ulimi olusha eyenzelwe ukukusiza ukuba ukwazi ulimi olusha ngokuqukethwe kwevidiyo okubandakanyayo. Ngendlela yayo yokufunda eyingqayizivele esekelwe ku-subtitle, Isidlali Solimi sikucwilisa kumavidiyo ayiqiniso abhekelela izintshisekelo zakho kanye nezinga lamakhono. Ipulatifomu yethu inikeza umtapo omkhulu wemibukiso ye-TV, ama-movie, nezinkulumo zokwenza ukufunda ulimi kungasebenzi nje, kodwa futhi kumnandi futhi kujabulise.
